cause.description:
Touching Lives” is an association of young people come together to help others - children, youth and the aged. They also bring their talents together in artistic expression to make their voices heard.
Our Aim is to help the society and explore oneself. To spread love through service! and to make this world a better place to live for everyone.
This association is the entity of enthusiasm, expertise, courage, youth and vision!
Like a stone in a placid pool, we in “Touching Lives” want to create ripples that spread onwards touching peoples lives.
1. Touching Lives also messages people that each one in their own possible way can reach out to people. It emphasizes not on the quantity of people to be served but quality service. Making a difference to just one life could make life differences and discard
cause.mission: Our Aim is to help the society and explore oneself.
cause.name: Touching Lives in Canada
